name: StitchPunk
description:
++ Negotiations concluded.

Conclusion = They have opted for oblivion.

 ~ Assign combatant. 

~ Class: Stitchpunk 

~ Brief: Cleanse area of infected. Eradicate virus. Wave stratagem detected. Funds will be released per target. ++

• An intense 2D platforming shoot 'em up that fuses several different themes and mechanics for a unique experience. 

• Discover a new protagonist in a short demo adventure with the potential to grow into an expansive universe full of new abilities and characters. 

• Fight as a Stitchpunk - a cybernetically augmented symbiote hired for combat - through the long abandoned district 19 and purge it of its virus-ridden inhabitants. 

• Slay the leather-heads, earn money and traverse a hand-drawn, metroidvania style world with new powers to unlock along the way.
